description: This script defines a Django custom management command that generates and saves an OpenAPI schema for the API, utilizing drf-yasg and Django's RequestFactory.

classes.name: Command
classes.description: A Django custom management command that generates an OpenAPI schema and saves it to a file.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: Generates an OpenAPI schema using drf-yasg, renders the response, parses the JSON content, and saves it to a file in the 'interfaces' directory.
